alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 16 at 12:06PM AKDT until March 17 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW FOLLOWED BY HEAVY RAIN FOR SOUTHEAST ALASKA... .Snow changed to rain near sea level in Haines and Skagway early Thursday morning with a strong wind shift to the south. Temperatures remain below freezing out the highways with snow continuing fall. For Yakutat, the main plume of moisture will shift to the west over that area Thursday evening with greater precipitation rates. Snowfall in Yakutat will depend if the wind direction remains E-NE and limits warming. If a shift to the south happens earlier, then a change to rain will occur. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will move back into the Yakutat area this evening with greatest rates before midnight. A wind shift to the south will cause a mix or change to rain.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
